item.title: About
item.description: I am software geek and a hands on developer/system architect. Interested in all kinds of software related technologies (languages, architectures and methodologies). Strong believer in the fact that one should keep knowledge up-to-date, but also understand why you should choose a particular technology for a given problem. Keeping knowledge up-to-date if fundamental and that is why regular visits to conferences like QCon, Devoxx, BuildStuf and various Meetup communities are part of my working habbit.

item.title: Resume
item.description: You can find my resume online at http://mpas.github.io/resume
